Menagerie:HydraHeads.NAME: Hydra Heads
DESCRIPTIONS: Has #b1 #yStrength per head. When this enemy takes #b{0} or more damage from a single hit, loses a head. Regrows twice as many heads in two turns.

Menagerie:SerpentsGaze.NAME: Serpent's Gaze
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you draw costs #b{0} more this turn.

Menagerie:SquabblingHeads.NAME: Squabbling Heads
DESCRIPTIONS: The Chimera's heads squabble for dominance. Gains an effect based on the current head. Switches heads every three cards you play. NL Lion's Maw: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, add a #ySlimed, #yWound, or #yBurn into your discard pile. NL Goat's Horn: This enemy gains #b1 #yMalleable. NL Serpent's Gaze: The first card you draw costs #b1 more this turn.

Menagerie:EntropyAura.NAME: Entropy Aura
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of this enemy's turn, you lose #b1 Strength and #b1 Dexterity.

Menagerie:Melting.NAME: Leaf Spores
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy is melting down! Loses #b{0} #yMetallicize each turn. NL When all #yMetallicize is lost, performs a dangerous attack.

Menagerie:Thawing.NAME: Thawing
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy will thaw in #b{0} turns. The turn it thaws, it will attack, dealing #b{1} extra damage got each HP it has, then die.
